message: Let's split fairly, but I get a little extra for going first in this inflationary environment.
Your offer was unfair considering the inflation. I propose a simple even split.
Bob, my friend, we are running out of time.  Let's be reasonable. You get a good deal here considering the inflation that's eating away at my share.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'll accept your original offer, but this is the last round I'm willing to negotiate.
